Package com.shawnclake.morgencore.core.component.crypto

Class PBKDF2

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shawnclake.morgencore.core.component.crypto.PBKDF2

  • public class PBKDF2
extends java.lang.Object
    PBKDF2 Password Hashing Class Creates strong password hashes and can verify plaintext again these hashes for logging in
    Author:
    https://gist.github.com/jtan189/3804290 Modified and maintained by Shawn Clake

      • validatePassword

        public static boolean validatePassword​(java.lang.String password,
                                       java.lang.String goodHash)
                                throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                       java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
        Validates a password using a hash.
        Parameters:
        password - the password to check
        goodHash - the hash of the valid password
        Returns:
        true if the password is correct, false if not
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
